department: Departments of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Supply, delivery and offloading of industrial trucks to Banff National Park
description: The supply, delivery and offloading of 1 (one) industrial truck to Banff National Park, Banff, Alberta and its expected operation will begin on January 26, 2023.
